short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add friction to internet browsing distractions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Friction blocks you from accessing certain websites based on rules you define to help you be more productive during the day. If you'd like to override the blocking, you can do so using 2FA (Two Factor Authentication).

- For light blocking, set up Friction's 2FA on your phone.
- For HARDCORE blocking, have a friend set up Friction's 2FA on their phone.

Updated: September 2024
